pageContent:
Development Time: 1 Week

Original Release Date: September 4, 2015

Engine: RPG Maker VX Ace

Summary

You wake up with no memories of your prior life, with just a few notes and clues lying around, with no way of telling who you are, and why you woke up here in a hospital facility. You must travel around this hospital looking for clues to help you find out who you truly are, and what happened to you, and the hospital you woke up in. You will soon discover there is a real big secret that has been kept inside these walls, and you are not the only one having problems

Note:  this game was developed for a 1 week indie game jam, there will be obvious flaws bugs, and areas where there could be improvement. I had a lot of fun and when I was complete I did proceed to develop the story further but have since then paused all development. I'm still unsure if I will continue the project or not. 

Controls

Arrow Key - Movement
Escape - Cancel/Menu
Enter/Space - Ok/Activate
A - Attack
D - Enable skill
S - Cast Skill
title: Subject Zero
shortText: A horror mystery of a man who wakes up in a hospital with unique abilities and no memories
